statements: UPDATE player_interactions SET interaction_description = 'Liked the game' WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'

UPDATE chat_logs SET log_message = 'Hello, how are you?', player_id = '234e5678-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000', log_time = '2022-06-15 10:30:00' WHERE log_id = '345e6789-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
